jProtocol.Abstract

Interface ViewProvider<T extends ProtocolDataUnit>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The protocol data unit the protocol uses.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EchoProvider, Tls12Provider

    public interface ViewProvider<T extends ProtocolDataUnit>
    A view provider provides views which will be shown in the main application. It needs views for the client, server and a protocol data unit dependent detail view, as well as methods to handle client and server view updates.
    Author:
    Tom Petersen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JComponent getDetailedViewForProtocolDataUnit(T pdu, HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
      Should return a view with details of the protocol data unit.
      java.lang.String getHtmlAboutContent()
      Should return the HTML content which is displayed in the 'about protocol' view.
      javax.swing.JComponent getSettingsView()
      Should return a view displaying (optional) settings for the protocol.
      javax.swing.JComponent getViewForClientStateMachine(HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
      Should return a view displaying the client state.
      javax.swing.JComponent getViewForServerStateMachine(HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
      Should return a view displaying the server state.
      void updateClientView()
      Will be called when the client state machines notifyObserversOfStateChanged method is called.
      void updateServerView()
      Will be called when the server state machines notifyObserversOfStateChanged method is called.

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailedViewForProtocolDataUnit

        javax.swing.JComponent getDetailedViewForProtocolDataUnit(T pdu,
                                                          HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
        Should return a view with details of the protocol data unit. This method will be called for every protocol data unit which is selected in the protocol data unit list.
        Parameters:
        pdu - the protocol data unit
        htmlInfoUpdater - an updater to set the info view content
        Returns:
        the detailed view

      • getViewForClientStateMachine

        javax.swing.JComponent getViewForClientStateMachine(HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
        Should return a view displaying the client state. This method will be only be called once on application startup, so the view should be stored to react to state updates.
        Parameters:
        htmlInfoUpdater - an updater to set the info view content
        Returns:
        the client view

      • getViewForServerStateMachine

        javax.swing.JComponent getViewForServerStateMachine(HtmlInfoUpdater htmlInfoUpdater)
        Should return a view displaying the server state. This method will only be called once on application startup, so the view should be stored to react to state updates.
        Parameters:
        htmlInfoUpdater - an updater to set the info view content
        Returns:
        the server view

      • updateServerView

        void updateServerView()
        Will be called when the server state machines notifyObserversOfStateChanged method is called. The server view should be updated to display the new state.

      • updateClientView

        void updateClientView()
        Will be called when the client state machines notifyObserversOfStateChanged method is called. The client view should be updated to display the new state.

      • getSettingsView

        javax.swing.JComponent getSettingsView()
        Should return a view displaying (optional) settings for the protocol. Will be shown in the start protocol view. Settings changes must be handled by the provider itself.
        Returns:
        a preferences view

      • getHtmlAboutContent

        java.lang.String getHtmlAboutContent()
        Should return the HTML content which is displayed in the 'about protocol' view.
        Returns:
        the HTML content
